channel.title: Configuration on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Configuration on Arrans github.io

item.title: twpayne/chezmoi
item.description: Manage your dotfiles across multiple diverse machines, securely.

item.title: knadh/koanf
item.description: Simple, extremely lightweight, extensible, configuration management library for Go. Supports JSON, TOML, YAML, env, command line, file, S3 etc. Alternative to viper.

item.title: caarlos0/env
item.description: A simple, zero-dependencies library to parse environment variables into structs

item.title: kcl-lang/kcl
item.description: KCL Programming Language (CNCF Sandbox Project). https://kcl-lang.io

item.title: cue-lang/cue
item.description: The home of the CUE language! Validate and define text-based and dynamic configuration

item.title: TomWright/dasel
item.description: Select, put and delete data from JSON, TOML, YAML, XML and CSV files with a single tool. Supports conversion between formats and can be used as a Go package.

item.title: padok-team/yatas
item.description: 🦉🔎 A simple tool to audit your AWS/GCP infrastructure for misconfiguration or potential security issues with plugins integration
